header: to find the right person for the
sub_header: We are creating a unique workspace culture! We help you to find the perfect job! The only thing You have to do is SWIPE!

section_1_cards.heading: Create an Account
section_1_cards.body: Click get started to create an account by simply choosing a codeName

section_1_cards.heading: Play Cards
section_1_cards.body: After you get logged in, you can play cards. Simply Swipe left or right according to your preference

section_1_cards.heading: View Results
section_1_cards.body: View Results after you have played cards, using a complex algorithm we rank your matches.
